Variables
SharpNeat.​Graphs
namespace SharpNeat.Graphs
WeightedDirectedConnection
IComparable​<WeightedDirectedConnection<T>>
public readonly struct
WeightedDirectedConnection​<T>
where T : struct

Represents a connection between two nodes, combined with a connection weight.

This type does not inherit from DirectedConnection as might be expected because these are structs (value types) and therefore inheritance is not possible.

Type Parameter
T

Connection weight data type.

Properties

public int SourceId { get }

Connection source node ID.

public int TargetId { get }

Connection target node ID.

Weight
public T Weight { get }

Connection weight.
